componentDescription: Displays a circular avatar with image fallback and custom styling options.

src.description: Mandatory string indicating the image source URL for the avatar.

size.description: Optional property to specify the size of the avatar, from predefined Size options.

fallback.description: Optional string for an image URL to use if the primary 'src' fails to load.

styles.description: Optional object to apply custom styles to the avatar component.

imageError.description: Boolean to track if there was an error loading the image, for conditional rendering or fallbacks.

setImageError.description: Function to set the image error state, aiding in error handling for the avatar.
